name: Hawkridge Development
overview: We specialize in Content Organization to give your customer an idea of your hierarchy of options. The most important part of the effective execution of the development of a website is the planning stage. In this process we sit down with you and learn about the details of your business, the demographics that your company caters towards and the tone of the organization so we can portray an accurate online image. The tone of your site will be imperative to give your customers a full experience equipped with liquid or fixed designs including image manipulation, consistency and balance. We will create a site map to group related items together for a user friendly interface that is copy written using stated international symbols to ensure the content we create together stays within the site. Our websites are focused on clear navigation so your customers have no confusion of what products or services you offer. We will create the appropriate links to organizations or partners that you’re involved with as well as link to your social media platforms that we develop for you – free of charge.
